name: GOLDRUSHERS
description: A Goldrush themed local multiplayer brawler for PC and Mac!Play as two competing prospectors trying to fill your safes with precious gold nuggets or other items of value.GOLDRUSHERS will provide fast paced action, wacky antics, and flying horses for your living room.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core or Equivalient Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: One additional Xbox One / Sony Dualshock 4 Controller required.
